# Exotic Artisan (Building)
## Overview
**Exotic Artisan**

**Create** 44 Goods, 1 Influence, 41 Labor (1,730 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Artisan's Workshop (Room)|Artisanâ€™s Workshop]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]]

The workshop and home for a creator of magic items, a fireworks maker, a glassblower, or the like.
